attributes.action: To stop the ban of Xl bully dogs
attributes.additional_details: You are blaming the Xl bully but it’s the owners not the dogs fault the dogs never asked to be born but they are born as a baby an not vicious start blaming the owners
attributes.background: Stop the ban of the Xl bully dogs an start looking in to the owners no Xl bully is born vicious start looking at this properly

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
